Package com.google.code.objectprops

Interface Summary
IFormat The IFormat declares the common interface of classes that can convert a Java object of a specific type to a String representation and vice versa.
 

Class Summary
DefaultFormatter The DefaultFormatter is a formatter with preconfigured formats for generally used types.
Formatter The Formatter can convert a Java object to a String representation and vice versa.
ObjectPropertiesStore The ObjectPropertiesStore can serialize (and deserialize) the state of any Java object into a Properties object by serializing all (non-static and non-transient) fields.
OrderedProperties Decorator for an order-preserving Properties object.
 

Exception Summary
FormatException The FormatException is thrown whenever an IFormat can't parse or format a value.
ObjectPropertiesStoreException The ObjectPropertiesStoreException.
UnknownFormatException The UnknownFormatException informs about a missing format.
